mean_cn: n. 宇宙空间，航空与航天飞行学；  adj. 航空与航天的，宇宙空间的
mean_en: an industry that deals with travel in and above the Earth's atmosphere and with the production of vehicles used in such travel
word_etyma: aero空气 + space空间 → aerospace（大气层内外）空间
sentence: I work in the aerospace industry--I've loved space exploration since I was young.
sentence_trans: 我在航空航天领域工作—我从小就对空间探索感兴趣。
